Description.Text: Leonart Hotel is a classic 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Moscow. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, free parking and a good location close to Christye Prudy Park. Komsomolskaya Square is located just northeast of the historic centre and is a busy, grand plaza surrounded by impressive examples of Stalinist and more traditional architecture. Nearby places of interest include three international train stations, one of the famous 'Seven Sisters' skyscrapers and the Olympic Stadium. Several metro stations are located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Moscow destinations. The hotel is housed in a traditional mid-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are comfortably furnished and decorated in a warm style with carpeted floors. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV and a work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
